logout: You have been logout of your account
welcome_msg: You just created a stack on GetPaper. Next we’ll show you how to get buying and selling - it only takes a minute or two!
error_shopify_exists: This shopify address already belongs to another getpaper account.
error_shopify_no_token: Sorry, we didn't get your shopify token
product_added: 'Now that you’ve added products you can start selling. Create your first order form now.
valid_email: Please provide a valid email and a password.
error_creating_account: An error occured while creating your account.
email_in_use: Email is invalid or already in use!
generic_error: An error occured, please try again later
terms: By clicking “I Agree”, you understand and agree to the Contract on behalf of the Customer(as described in Customer Terms of Service). Privacy Policy and Cookie Policy.
account_created: Account Created, please confirm your email, thank you!
select_buy_or_sell: Please select at least one option, buy or sell products.
reset_email_instructions: Instructions were sent to your email!
delete_address_confirmation: Are you sure to delete this address:
email_updated: Your email has now been updated. You will receive a confirmation email shortly!
invalid_store: The store you entered is not valid or already in use.
delete_store_confirmation: Are you sure to delete this store:
select_at_least_one_product: Please select at least one product!
stacks_name_already_exist: An order form with this name already exists!
link_stack_invalid: The link you used in invalid, contact the owner of this stack ...
need_at_least_one_product: You need to at least have one product selected.
cant_buy_from_your_own: You are the owner of those products. You can't place an order.
you_need_to_be_logged_to_continue: You need to be logged in to keep going.
you_need_stripe_connect: You need to setup Stripe for other people to purchase your products. You can skip it by clicking next. Your stack will be in preview mode.
preview_mode: People can preview your stack but cannot purchase your products. (Preview)
stack_is_in_preview: The owner of this stack didn't fill payment information. Stack is in Preview Mode.
payment_stripe_inactive: Stripe configuration failed. You can contact us or the stack owner.
choose_option_for_order_form: Choose option for your order form
